member.name: T:ScrewTurn.Wiki.BackupRestore.BackupRestore
member.summary: Implements a Backup and Restore procedure for settings storage providers.
Backups all the providers (excluded global settings storage provider).
member.param: The name of the zip file where to store the backup file.
member.returns: true if the backup has been succesfull.

member.name: M:ScrewTurn.Wiki.BackupRestore.BackupRestore.BackupSettingsStorageProvider(System.String,ScrewTurn.Wiki.PluginFramework.ISettingsStorageProviderV30,System.String[],System.String[])
member.param: The zip file name where to store the backup.
member.returns: true if the backup file has been succesfully created.

member.name: M:ScrewTurn.Wiki.BackupRestore.BackupRestore.BackupPagesStorageProvider(System.String,ScrewTurn.Wiki.PluginFramework.IPagesStorageProviderV30)
member.param: The zip file name where to store the backup.
member.returns: true if the backup file has been succesfully created.

member.name: M:ScrewTurn.Wiki.BackupRestore.BackupRestore.BackupUsersStorageProvider(System.String,ScrewTurn.Wiki.PluginFramework.IUsersStorageProviderV30)
member.param: The zip file name where to store the backup.
member.returns: true if the backup file has been succesfully created.

member.name: M:ScrewTurn.Wiki.BackupRestore.BackupRestore.BackupFilesStorageProvider(System.String,ScrewTurn.Wiki.PluginFramework.IFilesStorageProviderV30,ScrewTurn.Wiki.PluginFramework.IPagesStorageProviderV30[])
member.param: The zip file name where to store the backup.
member.returns: true if the backup file has been succesfully created.
